author: jeongeun
body:
PR description: 
Move Sequence to Task for **RecoTauTag  RecoCTPPS** cff python files. 
(An extension of the previous task [PR#25163](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25163), [PR#27474](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27474) , [PR#27640](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27640), [PR#27887](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27887), [PR#28050](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28050), [PR#28300](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28300) )

Tested in CMSSW_11_0_X_2019_11-12-2300, the test all passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Move Sequence to Task for RecoTauTag RecoCTPPS
